about_the_game:
Welcome to The Mirage: Your shift starts now 🎃


Manny's Murderous Movie Theater is a free prologue to Massacre at the Mirage! If you enjoy Manny's, be sure to check out the full game, which includes both simulation and story modes. Massacre at the Mirage launches on October 28—add it to your wishlist on Steam now!

Step into The Mirage, the beloved cinema of this quaint town, and get ready for the chaos! Guests are craving their favorite snacks, and they're not going to be patient. Meanwhile, Manny the Clown—the masked killer and cinema manager—is lurking close, ensuring your service meets his gruesome standards.

  • 🍿 Serve moviegoers their favorite snacks and keep them satisfied

  • 🏬 Upgrade your shop to handle the ever-growing, insatiable crowds

  • 🗡️ Harvest pockets (and possibly organs) to meet your quotas

  • 👻 Customize your experience with spooky collectibles

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains heavy depictions of blood, gore, horror, frightening scenes and violence and is not suited for children and young people under the age of 16.
